txt.en: Return to Captain Agelmund in Feldburg

'You defeated several of the pack-members outside of Fang Point, but I wish to know more about the beasts' movements of late. What is causing this change?\n\n'It would be very helpful to know more; will you scout the north and south of Fang Point, and see what there is to see?'
'The Wargs in Fang Point are a larger pack than I expected. Thank you for the scouting report.'
The Wargs of Fang point have grown increasingly aggressive of late, and Agelmund wishes to know what has caused this change in their behaviour.
You assessed the threats in the northern area of Fang Point
You assessed the threats in the southern area of Fang Point
Scout the northern den of Fang Point
Fang Point is south of Feldburg, with two dens associated with the same pack: one to the north, and one to the south..\n\nYou should scout the north and south dens of Fang Point.
Scout the southern den of Fang Point
Captain Agelmund awaits you at Feldburg in the Wold.\n\nYou should return to Captain Agelmund with your assessment of the Wargs in Fang Point.
